channel.title: Resolution issues
channel.description:
Can't get resolutions over 1152x864 on an NVidia 540M, and resolution choices don't stick between sessions.
It might be BMS not using my NVidia card and instead defaulting to the Intel integrated (this is an Optimus-enabled laptop) but I'm not sure how to check that or redirect it to the discrete GPU, and I'm not so sure that's the issue anyway.
Ideas?

item.title: Resolution issues
item.dc:creator: Tenspeed2113
item.description:
Parismio:

Someone help. I changed my resolution and it crashed. Now whenever i try to reboot it I keep getting a “Can’t created D3D file” or something like that. It’s getting frustrating.

https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=1740-IMNO-4856

Set up the launch options and it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Resolution issues
item.dc:creator: bangbang
item.description:
I am using nvidia gtx 670 and a 2560x1440 lcd. In game max res is 1920x1440 and is stuck at 4:3. Selecting 16:9 or 16:10 does not change aspect. Got the black bars on side. Should i be able to go 2560x1440 16:9 in this game?

Read full topic

item.title: Resolution issues
item.dc:creator: militant
item.description:
Can’t get resolutions over 1152x864 on an NVidia 540M, and resolution choices don’t stick between sessions.

It might be BMS not using my NVidia card and instead defaulting to the Intel integrated (this is an Optimus-enabled laptop) but I’m not sure how to check that or redirect it to the discrete GPU, and I’m not so sure that’s the issue anyway.
